programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)

programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Tuff Turf: O Rebelde, (1985, Drama)

programme.title: Eu, Christiane F. - 13 Anos, Drogada e Prostituda, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos anos 1970, em Berlim, uma adolescente se torna viciada em herona. Tudo em sua vida comea a distorcer e lentamente desaparece medida que ela se torna amiga de um pequeno grupo de viciados e se apaixona por um viciado em drogas.

programme.title: 41 DP - Inferno no Bronx, (1981, Drama)

programme.title: Temporada de Caa, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Wade Whitehouse um policial de uma pequena cidade. Isolado das pessoas ao seu redor, incluindo um pai dominador e uma mulher divorciada, ele se torna obcecado com a resoluo de um acidente de caa fatal, levando a uma srie de acontecimentos trgicos.

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Drama)

programme.desc: Dwayne McClaren sonha em deixar Cut Bank para se mudar para a cidade grande com sua namorada Cassandra, que quer ser modelo. McClaren estar envolvido em uma investigao liderada pelo 'Sheriff' Vogel e ter que adiar seus planos.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e a equipe 7 recebem a misso de encontrar um pesquisador desaparecido de uma companhia de equipamentos mdicos em uma nao distante.

programme.desc: Boruto e sua equipe finalmente encontram o pesquisador desaparecido. Apesar de ele resistir, a equipe est determinada a lev-lo de volta em segurana ao cliente.

programme.desc: Deixando Mitsuki sob os cuidados de Yubina, uma mdica e amiga de Mugino, Boruto e os outros vo a um mercado clandestino no Pas do Silncio.

programme.desc: Boruto e os outros descobrem que a Clula do Hashirama est nas mos de um indivduo rico que vive no Castelo Fushuu e planejam recuper-la.

programme.desc: Boruto e os outros se envolvem em um incidente no Castelo Fushuu, e alm de serem taxados de criminosos, eles so perseguidos por uma gangue do Pas do Silncio.

programme.desc: Boruto e os outros conseguem escapar da barreira de Yuuga, mas agora, seu irmo mais novo, Hiruga, entra no caminho.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e sua equipe esto determinados a alcanar Asaka, o irmo mais velho dos ninjas do Pas do Silncio, antes de Deepa.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Shikadai, que j sentiu o poder aterrorizante de Deepa, diz a Boruto que uma revanche com Deepa seria imprudente.

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrot-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo v Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei destrudo e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que esto tentando escapar o mais rpido possvel, ele v uma iluso de Kikyo.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The High Priestess, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The High Priestess, Part 2
programme.desc: The team attempts to escape the submarine with scuba gear as it sinks under attacks from the shape-changing enemy Stand "High Priestess."

programme.title: Jimi: All Is By My Side, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Educational)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: Naruto and Haruna are confronted by Renga. Declaring that he has taken down others before them, he advances on Naruto, ordering him to hand over the princess!

programme.title: The princess has gained weight due to nerves and wants Ino to pose as the princess in order to attend the first meeting with a prince she adores.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee opens a dojo because he feels like he isn't keeping up with his training. He is hoping challengers will come to his dojo to face him in battle.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage have disappeared. Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are sent on a mission and they discover an eerie castle looming in the middle of the road!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: During Lee's medical check-up, he discovers that there's a lot of damage in his chakra network. Guy tries to cheer him up by taking Lee to the Academy training hall.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura's true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The ANBU Black Ops suspect that Genno, a carpenter of Hidden Leaf Village, stole important blueprints of the village. Tsunade concludes that the one who used Genno plans to attack the Village and puts the village on Super S-Rank Alert!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: ANBU Black Ops puts Naruto under retro-hypnosis to extract Genno's motives. Without much success, Hidden Waterfall Village will be conducting maneuvers close to the village borders.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While looking for the scattered blueprints, Naruto and his team realize that Genno's actions are a diversion.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are shocked at the number of paper bombs placed throughout the village. While removing the seals, unexpected help arrives in the way of Homura and Koharu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto confronts Genno, and Shikamaru realizes that all the traps are all diversions. Genno's intention was to bury the village in a rockslide. Can the 11 ninjas save the village from destruction?
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto Uzumaki and Sakura Haruno take the microphones as hosts and then the program begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto encounters a young girl named Yakumo drawing a strange picture. The ANBU Black Ops and the Medical Corps arrive and whisk her away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto has a dream about Yakumo wishing to become a ninja and Kurenai threatens to seal her power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The assailants are members of the Kurama Clan of Hidden Leaf Village. Naruto and company rush to the villa to protect Yakumo.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto goes to the hospital, when Unkai the ninja, who attacked them at the villa, appears. They search the village and come up with a theory based on the movement of Shinos parasitic insects.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto finds that Yakumo has put Kurenai in a desperate situation, and the terrible secret of the Kurama villa reveals itself.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Kiba's mission is to guard a prized tea bowl and meet the client Shinemon.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gantetsu, a member of the Ninja Dropouts requests a guarded escort out of Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After evading the ambush by the Ninja Dropouts, Naruto, Gantetsu, and Todoroki find themselves in a forest maze that confuses a human's sense of direction.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The relationship between Gantetsu and Todoroki is revealed and tensions rise between the two.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After a heated battle, Naruto has the enemy cornered, but a boy is taken. This boy turns out to be Akio, Todoroki's younger brother, who Todoroki thought was dead.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto comes upon an injured youth who has lost his memory. Tsunade is cautious about the boy's presence, but Naruto is impressed by the boy's kindness and insists on allowing the boy to stay.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade believes that Menma has some connection to the Hidden Sound Village, and Naruto and the others head to the Land of Rice Paddies to check into Menma's Memories.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Two for the Money, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby, (2016, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Bridget Jones is back, this time unexpectedly expecting a baby while unsure of the identity of the dad. Oscar winners Rene Zellweger and Colin Firth are joined by Patrick Dempsey in this next chapter of Bridget's hysterically unpredictable life.

programme.title: Allied, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: London Has Fallen, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Triple 9, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: A rookie cop finds himself in the middle of a deadly heist involving crooked cops and the Russian mob.

programme.title: The Invitation, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama (Girlfight, Jennifer's Body), the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: The Motel, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Puberty sucks, and nobody knows it better than 13-year-old Ernest. As he watches guests come and go, Ernest finds himself forever stuck at his family's hourly-rate motel and longing for the girl of his dreams, 15-year-old Christine.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby, (2016, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Bridget Jones is back, this time unexpectedly expecting a baby while unsure of the identity of the dad. Oscar winners Rene Zellweger and Colin Firth are joined by Patrick Dempsey in this next chapter of Bridget's hysterically unpredictable life.

programme.title: Allied, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: London Has Fallen, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Snake Eyes, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Set in Atlantic City, an assassination attempt thrusts a detective into a murder case with 14,000 potential suspects and a deadly conspiracy where nothing is what it appears to be.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In this edgy and darkly humorous Western, a mysterious young woman rides into the lawless town of Redemption to settle an old score that has haunted her since she was a child. She becomes swept up in a deadly quick-draw tournament. Rated: R

programme.title: The Phantom, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Val Kilmer star in this terrific adventure set in 1896 East Africa. There, two lions on a man-eating rampage have shut down the construction of a railway. The beasts hunt together, showing no fear of man or fire.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Save The Tiger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon plays Harry Stoner, a man caught in violent collision with his past and present life. He believes there is nothing significant in his life except survival, and that instinct pushes him beyond moral conduct.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1978, Science fiction)
programme.desc: This dazzling remake of the 1956 spine-tingler stars Donald Sutherland, Brooke Adams, Jeff Goldblum, Leonard Nimoy and Veronica Cartwright in an eerie tale of possession by "alien pods."

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: 40th Anniversary, (1974, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five youths on a weekend getaway fall prey to a depraved family of cannibals in Tobe Hooper's masterpiece of subversive horror, now featuring a 4k digital transfer and all-new surround sound mix supervised by the director.

programme.title: The Crazies, (1973, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Its code name is Trixie, an experimental government germ weapon that leaves its victims either dead or irreversibly insane. And when the virus is accidentally unleashed in Evans City, PA, the small community becomes a war zone.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: The Dunwich Horror, (1970, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When a beautiful student named Nancy Wagner (Sandra Dee) catches the eye of the weird Wilbur Whateley (Dean Stockwell), her professor uncovers a buried secret and a plot intended to call forth an evil beyond imagination. Daniel Haller directs.

programme.title: A Boy And His Dog, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: World War IV has ravaged Earth, and its survivors must battle for food, shelter and companionship in a post-atomic wasteland.

programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

programme.desc: After finding out that Dennis is from the Fusion Dimension, Shay sets his sights on getting revenge!

programme.title: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but theyve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.

programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: In an effort to save Usopps village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami manages to rescue Zoros missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!

programme.title: Usopps friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates efforts to save her with a ship to call their own the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the worlds greatest swordsman but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merrys found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merrys been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the actions not dead in the water Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Kriegs pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things arent looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponents weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami whos on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Namis loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one things for sure no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Namis adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmakers younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Namis younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Namis treasure, but whos he working for? More importantly, whos Nami working for, and whats she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: The Straw Hats faith in Nami is restored, and now its time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlongs fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Namis former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. Hes so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Solomon Kane, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Captain Solomon Kane (James Purefoy) is a brutally efficient 16th Century killing machine.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Western)

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Bells Of Capistrano, (1942, Western)

programme.title: Call Of The Canyon, (1942, Western)

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Western)

programme.title: 2020. Amachi e sua gangue comeam o ataque contra o navio do governo. Naruto e os outros escapam da Ilha do Demnio, mas o que eles encontram a frota do Pas do Mar beira da aniquilao. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Desespero : Um Corao Partido! - T01E172

programme.title: 2020. Os ninjas da Folha e Amachi se enfrentam no mar. Com a ajuda de Naruto, Amachi derrotado, mas um monstro aparece. Naruto invoca Gamabunta para derrot-lo. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Batalha No Mar : O Poder Liberado!
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha No Mar : O Poder Liberado! - T01E173

programme.title: 2020. Kunijiro visita Tsunade e escolhe Naruto para guiar seu garoto por um dia na vida de um ninja! Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Impossvel!Arte Ninja: Jutsu Estilo Dinheiro! - T01E174

programme.title: 2020. Agari Kaisen, um amigo de Tsunade, pede a Naruto, Kiba, e Hinata que procurem um tesouro escondido. Achando ser uma tarefa fcil por terem um mapa, Tsunade ameaa mand-los de volta Academia, se falharem. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Caa Ao Tesouro Comea! - T01E175

programme.title: 2020. Depois de escaparem da caverna, Naruto e os outros vo atrs da cl Kedouin para impedir seu plano, mas a Aldeia Oculta da Folha j est sendo atacada. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Corra! Esquive-Se Em Zigue-Zague! Caar Ou Ser Caado!
programme.desc: Naruto: Corra! Esquive-Se Em Zigue-Zague! Caar Ou Ser Caado! - T01E176

programme.title: 2020. Naruto descobre que Jiraiya est aprontando algo. Jiraiya diz que est ocupado preparando seu manuscrito antes do prazo final. Naruto, impaciente e irritado, escreve seu prprio manuscrito para Jiraiya! Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Por Favor, Senhor Carteiro! - T01E177

programme.title: 2020. A Aldeia Oculta nas Estrelas pede Aldeia Oculta da Folha para proteger uma estrela. A estrela, na verdade, um meteorito que caiu 200 anos atrs, e dizem que ela possui poderes misteriosos. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Encontro! Um Menino Com Nome De Estrela
programme.desc: Naruto: Encontro! Um Menino Com Nome De Estrela - T01E178

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e os outros investigam o paradeiro da estrela roubada. O time suspeita algum da Aldeia Oculta nas Estrelas porque o ninja que roubou a estrela usou a arte ninja da aldeia, Kujaku. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Inesquecvel Cano De Ninar - T01E179

programme.title: 2020. Akahoshi, o ninja mascarado que sequestrou Sumaru, pretende usar Sumaru para chamar o ninja misterioso que roubou a estrela. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Jutsu Oculto! O Preo Da Arte Ninja: Kujaku
programme.desc: Naruto: Jutsu Oculto! O Preo Da Arte Ninja: Kujaku - T01E180

programme.title: 2020. O ninja mascarado e Naruto caem nas profundezas do vale. Ao tratar as feridas de Naruto, o ninja mascarado conta o motivo de ter roubado a estrela. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Hoshikage : A Verdade Enterrada - T01E181

programme.title: 2020. O corpo de Natsuhi afetado pelos efeitos da estrela. Ela controla a estrela e confronta Akahoshi desesperadamente, mas Sumaru levado como refm. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Reunio : O Tempo Restante - T01E182

programme.title: 2020. Sumaru sente a morte da me e foge furioso. Naruto incapaz de par-lo. Para salvar Sumaru, Hokuto e Mizura arriscam suas vidas para revelar a verdade por trs do treinamento com a estrela. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Estrela Radiante - T01E183

programme.title: 2020. Akamaru ferido por um shinobi rival de outra nao. O shinobi usou uma habilidade de luta que espalha bactria pelo corpo do oponente, infectando as capacidades mentais da vtima. Isso faz com que Akamura entre numa fria incontrolvel. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Longo Dia De Kiba - T01E184

programme.title: 2020. Uma misteriosa criatura se anexa a Naruto durante um treinamento na floresta. Tsunade comea a achar que a criatura lendria chamada Onbaa. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Lenda Da Aldeia Da Folha: O Onbaa!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Lenda Da Aldeia Da Folha: O Onbaa! - T01E185

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo - T02E54
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento - T02E55
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto: Uma Sombra Na Escurido: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke - T01E51
programme.sub-title: Uma Sombra Na Escurido: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke
programme.desc: 2020. No ltimo combate das preliminares, Choji luta contra o capanga de Orochimaru, Dosu. As preliminares finalmente terminam, e o Hokage revela a terceira prova, enquanto Orochimaru comea secretamente seu plano maligno. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto - T01E52
programme.sub-title: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto
programme.desc: 2020. Na preparao para a terceira prova, Kakashi escolhe Ebisu para treinar Naruto. Ebisu diz a Naruto que ele ainda no controla seu chakra o suficiente e o faz caminhar sobre gua. Naruto aprende rpido e impressiona Ebisu. Ento, uma figura aparece... Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Aps Muito Tempo...Jiraiya Retorna! - T01E53
programme.desc: 2020. Jiraiya, um dos Sannin lendrios, aparece de repente diante de Ebisu e Naruto. Naruto d a Jiraiya o apelido de "Sbio Tarado". Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Jutsu De Invocao : A Sabedoria Do Sbio Do Sapo! - T01E54
programme.sub-title: Jutsu De Invocao : A Sabedoria Do Sbio Do Sapo!
programme.desc: 2020. O ninja do Som, Dosu, aparece diante de Gaara e pretende derrot-lo, mas o oposto acontece. Um jonin da Aldeia da Areia e Kabuto os observam secretamente. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperana - T01E55
programme.sub-title: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperana
programme.desc: 2020. Naruto continua seu treino com Jiraiya para dominar o Jutsu de Invocao, que chama vrias criaturas selvagens. Mas ele tem dificuldades em controlar o Chacra da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Death Note - T01E09
programme.desc: 2007. Os assassinatos continuam, e L comea a suspeitar do comportamento perfeito de Light que ento decide investigar por conta prpria. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, Jos Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - T01E59
programme.desc: 2018. Diante de um adversrio que parece incrivelmente calmo e ameaador, Cho-Cho mostra uma seriedade raramente vista enquanto os companheiros de equipe torcem por ela. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Chie Nakamura, Romi Park, Shtar Morikubo, Junko Takeuchi, Ryko Shiraishi, Atsushi Abe, Kensh Ono, Ryichi Kijima, Kokoro Kikuchi, Yko Sanpei Diretor: Hiroyuki Yamashita

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro - T02E56
programme.desc: 2008. Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno - T02E57

Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido - T02E58

A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki - T01E42
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura - T01E43
programme.desc: 2008. Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha - T01E44
programme.desc: 2008. Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio - T01E45
programme.desc: 2008. Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada - T01E46
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra! - T01E47
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos - T01E48
programme.desc: 2008. Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante... - T01E49
programme.desc: 2008. A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro? Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado - T01E50
programme.desc: 2008. Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro - T01E51
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha - T01E52
programme.desc: 2008. Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso. programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Wildcat (2021)
programme.desc: A captive reporter must figure out a way to escape from the militants who ambushed her convoy in the Middle East.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: Under house arrest, a troubled youth (Shia LaBeouf) is unsure if his neighbor (David Morse) is really a serial killer or if his suspicions are the result of a captive and overactive imagination.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: Equilibrium (2002)
programme.desc: In the future a government agent (Christian Bale) and a band of rebels battle a regime that uses a drug to suppress peoples emotions.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Undisputed (2002)
programme.desc: An undefeated world-champion prizefighter, who is convicted of rape and sent to prison, must confront and fight the reigning prison boxing champion.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Cop Land (1997)
programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker (Dan Aykroyd) and a street hustler (Eddie Murphy).

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II (2000)
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III (2006)
programme.desc: Now a trainer for IMF recruits, agent Ethan Hunt squares off against the toughest foe he has ever faced, a ruthless arms and information broker.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol (2011)
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when its implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organizations name.

programme.title: Maniac (2012)
programme.desc: A serial killer (Elijah Wood) removes his victims scalps and attaches them to the vintage mannequins he restores in his late mothers shop.

programme.title: Villain (1971)
programme.desc: A razor-wielding London thug (Richard Burton) robs a payroll with his gang; his pimp boyfriend (Ian McShane) has the alibi.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: Grudge Match (2013)
programme.desc: A boxing promoter (Kevin Hart) offers two rival boxers (Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone) the chance to come out of retirement for one final bout.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane (2016)
programme.desc: A woman (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men (John Goodman, John Gallagher Jr.).

programme.title: Silence (2016)
programme.desc: Two 17th-century Portuguese missionaries (Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver) face the ultimate test of faith when they travel to Japan to find their missing mentor (Liam Neeson).

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.
